title: Against The Eldritch Creature (Part 2)
body:
Against The Eldritch Creature (Part 2)

Just as Evan used the soul absorption skill, the power of the black blood lightning reached a horrifying level. Evan's hands that he was using to hold the lightning orb started to disintegrate under the power of the lightning.

Although his hands were disintegrating, Evan didn't care about it and released the power of the lightning orb towards the Eldritch Creature like a mana cannon.

The beam of lightning engulfed the entire body of the Eldritch Creature and moved forward like an apocalyptic cannon, destroying everything that came into its way.

The Eldritch Creature howled in horror when it was engulfed by the beam of the black blood lightning and in less than a second, its body was disinterested, similar to Evan's hand.

Thud!

Evan suddenly heard a thudding sound and noticed a small limb of the Eldritch Creature that somehow survived the onslaught of the lightning.
